snippet: California Chrome, the Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner who finished third in Saturday’s Breeders’ Cup Classic, will race rather than retire to stud.
abstract: California Chrome, Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner who finished third in the Breeders’ Cup Classic, will race as a 4-year-old in 2015 rather than retire to stud.
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner who finished third in Saturday’s Breeders’ Cup Classic, will race rather than retire to stud.

headline.main: California Chrome Will Race as a 4-Year-Old
